descriptionHtml:
There has been something in Skyrim that always annoyed me, which is the fact that mage followers, sometimes just swing a sword or a bow and use it in Combat, which they shouldn\'t. This simple mod is fixing it, and mage followers will no longerc just take a weapon and use it, but only magic spells. It also adds them 2 regular spells that they\'ll use in some cases that they\'d take a weapon at instad of using their magic spells. 

**This does NOT affect on modded followers. 

Please let me know if it works after you tried it. If you liked it, please don\'t forget to thumbs up and like.
author: MasterFqF
